2.name: Enchantment Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an Enchantment spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Hypnotic Gaze
2.description: Charm and Incapacitate a target creature for 1 minute if it fails a Wisdom save. You can Maintain Hypnotic Gaze each turn to keep the target Charmed. (Recharge: Long rest)

6.name: Instinctive Charm
6.description: As a reaction, Charm an enemy attacking you. They will attack a different target instead of you.

10.name: Split Enchantment
10.description: You know your enchantments inside and out. You can target 2 creatures with Enchantment spells that would normally only target 1 creature.
